price: 112. Il dit : « Seigneur ! Juge (entre nous) en toute équité ! Et notre Seigneur est le Tout Clément, Celui Dont nous cherchons l’assistance contre vos allégations. »
arabic: قَٰلَ رَبِّ ٱحۡكُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۗ وَرَبُّنَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi uḥ'kum bil-ḥaqi warabbunā al-raḥmānu al-mus'taʿānu ʿalā mā taṣifūna
translations: the One Whose help is sought
